workshoptitle: Save the Wildlife - Automated CI/CD Release Pipelines for Gaming

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to the lab with OCI devops

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.description: Instruction to provision OCI devops ,OKE and related infrastructure

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Get to know more about OCI Devops components
tutorials.description: Get to know more about OCI devops components and artifacts

tutorials.title: Lab 3: New version release
tutorials.description: Release a new version and experience canary mode

tutorials.title: Lab4: Cleanup of lab resources
tutorials.description: Clean all the lab infra components
